Frequently Asked Questions

How does JobHackAI improve my resume's ATS performance?

JobHackAI uses advanced AI to analyze your resume against industry-specific ATS systems, identifying missing keywords, formatting issues, and opportunities for optimization. This increases your visibility by 3× on average.

Can I really create a professional resume in 60 seconds?

Yes! Our AI-powered system guides you through a simple process where you input your basic information, and our intelligent templates format your resume with proper keywords and industry-relevant structure.

What makes JobHackAI different from other resume builders?

Unlike generic resume builders, JobHackAI focuses on ATS optimization with real-time scoring, keyword injection, and proven results. We've helped 5,000+ job seekers land interviews within 7 days.

Is there a free trial available?

Yes! We offer a completely free trial that lets you create and optimize your first resume with full access to our AI—and you can see results immediately.

What file formats can I upload to JobHackAI?

You can upload your resume in PDF or DOCX format. JobHackAI accepts both, so you don't need to convert your file—just upload and get instant feedback.

Will my resume data be kept private?

Yes. JobHackAI keeps your resume data private and secure. We never share your information or documents with third parties. You have full control over your data at all times.
